name: hue Turns
description:
Turn your smartphone to match the color shown by your Philips hue system.
Your hue system will set your light to a particular color. Depending on the color you turn/tilt your smartphone to the right/left/front/back. When you make the correct move your score increases, otherwise you get a penalty.
After finishing a round of twisting with all correct moves you get another challenge with different colors.
